channel.title: Pdf on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Pdf on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: My Presentations from AstriCon 2010 are Available
item.description: Check out http://leifmadsen.com and click on the presentations tab. Under that tab you will find my presentations from AstriCon 2010, ’5 Things You Didn’t Know Asterisk Could Do’ and a slightly updated version of my ‘Building Distributed Queue Systems’ presentation. Both are in PDF format. Both presentations went over extremely well, and I think both probably ended up being, or nearly being, my best presentations ever given. In previous years I’ve given presentations on distributed Asterisk systems and last year at IT360 I gave my ”5 Things You Didn’t Know Asterisk Could Do” presentation, so perhaps being somewhat familiar with the format helped.
